full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA CHEN KHYAB 'JUG CHEN PO'I DUG DBYUNG BCOS THABS 'CHI MED BDUD RTZI ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES LHA CHEN KHYAB 'JUG CHEN PO'I DUG 'BYUNG BCOS THABS, ,'CHI MED BDUD RTZI ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA THO YON BLO BZANG SBYIN PA DANG, HUR TSA BI LIG THU @009B BLO BZANG SHES RAB SOGS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BAS NGO MA CHAG PAR, SU MA TI AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL DU SBYAR BA'O, ,MANGGA LAM, ,SA MA YA RGYA RGYA RGYA,)
